column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: In a shocking incident
column4: an Indian tuk tuk driver attacked two women on 335 Street. Boeung Kak 1
column6: Phnom Penh at 11:30 pm on 6 October 2019.------ According to the victim
column7: the victim she had ordered a Passapp
column9: when the tuk tuk plated Phnom Penh 1XX-7224 with P183578 Passapp ID puled up and tried to other the woman a ride.------The women refused and an argument broke out between the driver and one woman. The driver then took a steel bar from inside his tuk tuk and attacked the woman and escaped after people intervened. The incident was filmed by the other woman.------The victim also filed a complaint at Boeng Kak 1 police station
column12: to arrest the man for legal action. ------PKARTHMOR
